A magazine can be used as a makeshift pillow to rest your head on during transit.
A magazine can be used as a fan if the pages are fanned out and air is blown on it using a fan.
A magazine can be used as a scrapbook to cut out nice pictures from it and make a scrapbook.
A magazine can be used as a bookmark to reserve your place in a book.
A magazine can be used as a protective cover for electronics or other fragile items to protect them from scratches or damage.
